content: homespun dishcloths a set of two tunisian crochet dishcloth patterns materials  6 mm tunisian crochet hook  5 5 mm crochet hook  3 coordinating colorways of 100% cotton worsted weight yarn knit picks dishie & hobby lobby crafter s secret cotton yarns were used in the pattern photos  scissors  stitch marker  tapestry needle gauge 14 tss and 14 row = 4 finished size knit picks dishie 7 5 x 7 5 with border and blocked crafter s secret cotton 8 x 8 with border and blocked abbreviations us terms special technique instructions chain chain tss tunisian simple stitch y arn under yu wrap yarn over hook from front to back single_crochet single_crochet fwp forward pass  a yarn under is made after completing the slip_stitch slip_stitch retp return pass forward pass rig ht before a color chain ange is made on the return pass this helps create a tidier and sturdier left edge for working a border into later pattern notes  these patterns are available for personal non-commercial u se only the pattern and photographs contained in this document are property of crochet hello rewriting reselling distributing or copying the pattern or its photos is prohibited  previous experience and knowledge of basic crochet stitches and tunisian crochet techniques including forward pass return pass tunisian simple stitch and slip_stitch bind off is necessary  numbers in red and in parentheses indicate the stitch count or number of loops on hook after completing the forward pass  use any 3 coordinating colors you d like for color a color b and color c  yarn color changes are made before starting the return pass this will give the work a woven look no need to cut yarn in between color changes - just carry yarn up the left edge as you go these yarn carries can be hidden later when you work the border  finished size will vary depending on the hook size and yarn used as well as your specific gauge size can be easily adjusted by working fewer or more foundation chains and/or fewer or more row  follow along on instagram @crochet_hello and use the #crochethello or #homespundishcloth hashtags to share a picture of your work homespun dishcloth set copyright ©2019 crochet hello | crochethello@gmail com | @crochet_hello 1 2 color homespun dishcloth pattern foundation row with 6 mm tunisian crochet hook and color a chain 25 pull up a loop in the back bump of the 2nd chain from the hook and in the back bump of each of the remaining 23 chains 25 yu once with color a - see special technique instructions retp drop color a yo with color b and pull through 2 loops yo pull through 2 loops across until one loop remains on hook  when switching colors be sure to bring the dropped yarn strand toward the front of your work before you drop it carry the new color up behind this dropped strand
